text:
Including a static JSP using <%@ include file="xxx.jsp" %> generates bad code. 
The comment lines generated have incorrectly escaped paths.
(Note: I cannot use jsp:include since it flushes the output stream)

The exception generated is below:
org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile class for JSPC:\jakarta-
tomcat-3.2.1\work\localhost_8080%

escape character.

(19,8);to=C:\usr\projects\cwf\web\fw\DocNavPage.jsp(9,61)]

                               ^
